org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile

接口 HFile.Writer

  • 所有超级接口:
    AutoCloseable, CellSink, Closeable, ShipperListener
    所有已知实现类:
    HFileWriterImpl
    封闭类:
    HFile

    public static interface HFile.Writer
extends Closeable, CellSink, ShipperListener
    API required to write an HFile

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static byte[] MAX_MEMSTORE_TS_KEY
      Max memstore (mvcc) timestamp in FileInfo

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addDeleteFamilyBloomFilter(BloomFilterWriter bfw)
      Store delete family Bloom filter in the file, which is only supported in HFile V2.
      void addGeneralBloomFilter(BloomFilterWriter bfw)
      Store general Bloom filter in the file.
      void addInlineBlockWriter(InlineBlockWriter bloomWriter)
      Adds an inline block writer such as a multi-level block index writer or a compound Bloom filter writer.
      void appendFileInfo(byte[] key, byte[] value)
      Add an element to the file info map.
      void appendMetaBlock(String bloomFilterMetaKey, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable metaWriter) 
      HFileContext getFileContext()
      Return the file context for the HFile this writer belongs to
      org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getPath() 

      • 从接口继承的方法 java.io.Closeable

        close

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.CellSink

        append

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.ShipperListener

        beforeShipped

    • 字段详细资料

      • MAX_MEMSTORE_TS_KEY

        static final byte[] MAX_MEMSTORE_TS_KEY
        Max memstore (mvcc) timestamp in FileInfo

    • 方法详细资料

      • appendFileInfo

        void appendFileInfo(byte[] key,
                    byte[] value)
             throws IOException
        Add an element to the file info map.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getPath

        org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getPath()
        返回:
        the path to this HFile

      • addInlineBlockWriter

        void addInlineBlockWriter(InlineBlockWriter bloomWriter)
        Adds an inline block writer such as a multi-level block index writer or a compound Bloom filter writer.

      • appendMetaBlock

        void appendMetaBlock(String bloomFilterMetaKey,
                     org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable metaWriter)

      • addGeneralBloomFilter

        void addGeneralBloomFilter(BloomFilterWriter bfw)
        Store general Bloom filter in the file. This does not deal with Bloom filter internals but is necessary, since Bloom filters are stored differently in HFile version 1 and version 2.

      • addDeleteFamilyBloomFilter

        void addDeleteFamilyBloomFilter(BloomFilterWriter bfw)
                         throws IOException
        Store delete family Bloom filter in the file, which is only supported in HFile V2.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getFileContext

        HFileContext getFileContext()
        Return the file context for the HFile this writer belongs to
